Hero.name: André Contiero.
Hero.title: I build API's.
Hero.description: I'm a software developer based in Brazil, specializing in building exceptional API's applications, and everything in between.

About.title: About Me
About.description: Hello! My name is André Contiero and I'm Software developer specializing in building exceptional API's with 3+ years involved in the entire software development lifecycle providing IT solutions for public and private organizations. Passionate about learning new technologies like NodeJS, NestJS and TypeORM, finding solutions to work challenges and being part of a collaborative environment.

Contact.subtitle: What’s Next?
Contact.title: Get In Touch
Contact.description: Although I’m not currently looking for any new opportunities, my inbox is always open. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I’ll try my best to get back to you!
